skill.name: Athletics
skill.perk_bonus: Reduce the energy cost of sprinting
config.AlternativeStrongmanProfession.to:
REQUIRES RESTART!
Changes the Strongman/Stronggal profession to crack geodes instead
of allowing pickaxes and axes to charge.
Is forced on if Walk of Life is installed.
config.AlternativeSkillPageIcon.tooltip:
REQUIRES RESTART!
Changes the lightningbolt skill icon to a set of dumb-bells.
config.Key_Cast.tooltip: The key needed to toggle/hold for sprint.
config.ToggleSprint.tooltip: Change sprinting to be a toggle or a hold.
config.ExpChanceFromTools.tooltip: The chance for using a tool to give you exp. 25 is 25% chance.
config.ExpFromLightToolUse.tooltip: Exp from tools that drain stamina marked as light (Default: all tools except axes and pickaxes)
config.ExpFromHeavyToolUse.tooltip: Exp from tools that drain stamina marked as heavy (Default: axes and pickaxes)
config.MinimumEnergyToSprint.tooltip: The minimum required amount of energy that is needed to sprint.
moonslime.Athletics.sprinting.descriptio: Faster movement at the cost of energy!
moonslime.Athletics.GeodeOpen.InventoryF: You have no space to add the item you get from cracking this Geode to your inventory.
Athletic5a.name: Bodybuilder
Athletic5a.desc: Regenerate health based on athletics level.
Athletic5b.name: Jogger
Athletic5b.desc: Regenerate energy based on athletics level'
Athletic10a1.name: Strong${man^woman^person}$
Athletic10a1.desc: Allows the charging of Axes and Pickaxes.
Athletic10a1.WoL.desc: Allows cracking open normal geodes with right click when holding them.
Athletic10a2.name: Gridball Linebacker
Athletic10a2.desc: While sprinting, increase defense and reflect some damage back to the attacker based on athletics level.
Athletic10b1.name: Acrobat
Athletic10b1.desc: Gives a small chance to dodge damage based on athletics and luck level
Athletic10b2.name: Marathoner
Athletic10b2.desc: Increase sprinting speed and cut sprinting stamina use.
